title: Heimathaven Oldenburg
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little cafe in the center of Oldenburg. Has soy milk for coffee and tea and has also some vegan cakes. Is also a specialty grocery store that carries plenty of local items like beer, tea, chocolate and sometimes even organic or raw and vegan products.
